text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Wikinews interviews President of the International Brotherhood of Magicians
text.summary: For National Magic Month in the US, Wikinews interviews William Evans, President of the Brotherhood of Magicians, about the state of magic today, the impact of the Internet on magic, and his travel plans to upcoming magic events worldwide.
